text:
RELIGION

Sri Ramakrishna Sarada Samiti: Swamy Vivekanandar Jayanthi, pooja, bhajans and homam, discourse by Gopal Srinivasan, Sri Ramakrishna Temple, Golden Rock, 9.30 a.m.

Srimad Ubhaya Vedantacharya Peetam: “Bhagavata Dasamaskandam” by R. Anantharaman, 294, Sathara Street, Srirangam, 6.30 p.m.

Jehovah’s Witnesses: Circuit Assembly, Garbaratchagi Mahal, Cantonment, 9.20 a.m.

Sri Vishnu Sahasranama Parayana Sabha: Sri Vishnu Sahasranama parayanam, Akila Sathadha Sri Vaishnava Ramanuja Koodam, 12, Malligaipoo Agraharam, Srirangam, 6 p.m.

Sri Rama Nama Sath Sangam: Sri Rama nama parayanam, 80, II Main Street, SMESC Colony, 6 p.m.

GENERAL

Lions Clubs International: Regional meet, Suba Veerapandian, chief guest, RAR Mahal, Mathur, 10 a.m.

Mahalakshmi Engineering College and Dinamalar: Career guidance programme for Plus Two students, college campus, 9 a.m.

J.J. College of Engineering and Technology: Valediction of NSS special camp, Periya Alampatti, 4 p.m.

Harshamitra Super Speciality Cancer Centre: World Cancer Day, quiz contest on cancer, Periyar College of Pharmaceutical Sciences, K.K. Nagar, 9 a.m.

Department of Information and Public Relations: Government exhibition, St. John’s Vestry Anglo-Indian Higher Secondary School grounds, 4 p.m.

Tamil Nadu Handicrafts Development Corporation: Crafts Bazzar, Kailasapuram Club, BHEL, 10 a.m.

North Eastern Handicrafts and Handlooms Development Corporation: North East crafts bazaar, SRT Hall, Thillai Nagar, 10 a.m.

National Council of Dalit Christians: Consultative meeting on rally to be held in New Delhi, C.Arockiadas, president, NCDC, Tamil Nadu, presides, Shalom Hall, Tharangai Vasam, near Joseph Eye Hospital, 9 a.m.
title: TIRUCHI today
